elements.name: Case_01 The user should be able to access the home page

steps.name: the user opens the home page url
the home page should get opened with 'Signature Designer Light Fixtures | Experience Visual Comfort & Co.' title

description: Retail, Trade, or Wholesale users can place an order with the different payment methods

elements.name: Case_01 The retail user should be able to place an order for a product with credit card

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the 'Retail' user do login into the website
search 'Darlana Small Lantern'
select 'Darlana Small Lantern' search option
click on the 'Darlana Small Lantern' product from the products list
select the following product variants:
click on the add to cart button
click on the begin checkout button from the mini cart
select 'Standard Shipping' shipping method
click on the continue to payment button
select 'Credit/Debit Card' payment method
the 'Retail' user enters the following credit card or po details:
click on the place order button
the order of product should get placed with the following success message:

elements.name: Case_02 The trade user should be able to place an order for a product with credit card

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the 'Trade' user do login into the website
click on the 'Chandelier' submenu of 'Ceiling' mega menu
click on the 'Classic Ring Chandelier' product from the products list
select the following product variants:
click on the add to cart button
click on the begin checkout button from the mini cart
select 'Standard Shipping' shipping method
click on the continue to payment button
select 'Credit/Debit Card' payment method
the 'Trade' user enters the following credit card or po details:
click on the place order button
the order of product should get placed with the following success message:

elements.name: Case_03 The wholesale user should be able to place an order for a product with credit card

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the 'Wholesale' user do login into the website
enter the following product description page url:
select the following product variants:
click on the add to cart button
click on the begin checkout button from the mini cart
select 'Ship When Ready' shipping method
click on the continue to payment button
select 'Credit Card' payment method
the 'Wholesale' user enters the following credit card or po details:
click on the place order button
the order of product should get placed with the following success message:

elements.name: Case_04 The retail user should be able to place an order for a product with affirm payment method

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the 'Retail' user do login into the website
enter the following product description page url:
select the following product variants:
click on the add to cart button
click on the begin checkout button from the mini cart
select 'Standard Shipping' shipping method
click on the continue to payment button
select 'Pay over time' payment method
click on the place order button
enter '4806065600' affirm mobile number
click on the affirm continue button
enter '1234' affirm mobile pin
select '3 months' affirm plan
click on the affirm plan continue button
click on the I agree checkbox of affirm auto-pay
click on the affirm auto-pay confirm button
the order of product should get placed with the following success message:

select 'Wholesale Terms' payment method
the 'Wholesale' user enters the following credit card or po details:
click on the place order button
the order of product should get placed with the following success message:
